item.title: Pushpa 2 vs Baby John Screen Battle Intensifies: What are Anil Thadani and PVRInox fighting for this Christmas? - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 vs Baby John Screen Battle Intensifies: What are Anil Thadani and PVRInox fighting for this Christmas?

Published on Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The screen battle between Anil Thadani's Pushpa 2 and PVRInox's Baby John heats up as both parties vie for showtime during the Christmas holidays. Pushpa 2 seeks a dominant share of the shows, leading to tensions with multiplexes.

  • Pushpa 2 is aiming for 50% of showtimes on Christmas Day, while Baby John aims to secure at least 11,000 shows across India.
  • The competition has ignited disputes over how many shows each film will receive in multiplexes and single screens.
  • Pushpa 2 has been breaking box office records, approaching the Rs 600 crore mark after three weekends.
  • Multiplex operators are attempting to find a balance for both films while meeting industry demands.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs unfair to have 50 percent shows in week 4, leaving nothing for new releases.‚Äù

The outcome of this battle will heavily influence the box office performance as the films navigate the competitive landscape during the holiday season.

item.title: Pushpa 2, Stree 2 or Kalki 2898 AD? BookMyShow report reveals which movie sold most tickets in 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Tops 2024 Ticket Sales According to BookMyShow Report

Date: Dec 20, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

BookMyShow's year-end report reveals that Pushpa 2 is the most-watched movie of 2024, with significant box office success and audience engagement.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule sold 10.8 lakh solo tickets, becoming the most-watched film of the year.
  • The film is a sequel to the 2021 hit Pushpa: The Rise, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna.
  • November 1 was a blockbuster day, recording 2.3 million tickets sold in 24 hours.
  • Live entertainment consumption grew by 18% in 2024 with over 30,000 events across 319 cities.
  • Music tourism showed a rise with 477,393 fans traveling for events, indicating a growing trend in live participation.
"Pushpa 2 has dominated the buzz and attention this year, solidifying its position in Telugu cinema history."

The report indicates a strong year for Telugu cinema with a growing interest in live events and music, suggesting Post-pandemic recovery and increasing audience engagement.

item.title: Kannada star Shiva Rajkumar turns emotional as he leaves for surgery in the US - 123telugu
item.description:
Shiva Rajkumar Gets Emotional Before Surgery in the US

Published on Dec 20, 2024 | Source: 123telugu

Kannada film star Shiva Rajkumar expressed his emotions while addressing the media before departing for surgery in the USA. He thanked his fans, family, and friends for their support.

  • Shiva Rajkumar's surgery is scheduled for December 24 at the Miami Cancer Institute.
  • He cited Dr. Murugesh N Manohar as his oncologist, emphasizing his reputation and skills.
  • Shiva mentioned feeling nervous about leaving his loved ones but reassured fans that he is in good hands.
  • He plans to return to Bengaluru on January 26, with his family accompanying him during the treatment.
  • Currently, he is working on several projects, including Uttarakaanda and RC16.
‚ÄúHe is a very famous oncologist and has a good hand, a lucky hand. He assured me not to worry and told me the treatment would be a seamless procedure.‚Äù

Shiva Rajkumar's emotional farewell highlights the importance of support during challenging times, as he prepares for surgery that could greatly impact his health and career.

item.title: G-Dragon And Han So Hee Deny Dating Rumors - soompi
item.description:
G-Dragon And Han So Hee Deny Dating Rumors

Publication Date: December 20, 2024   Source: Soompi

G-Dragon and Han So Hee have officially denied any dating rumors that sparked online due to social media posts.

  • Speculation arose on December 19 from photos shared by both celebrities that seemed to be taken at the same location.
  • G-Dragon‚Äôs agency stated the dating accusations are ‚Äúcompletely untrue.‚Äù
  • Han So Hee‚Äôs agency echoed sentiments, declaring the claims are not true.
  • Both parties aimed to clarify the situation with official statements.
‚ÄúThe dating rumors between the two are completely untrue.‚Äù - G-Dragon‚Äôs agency

In summary, both G-Dragon and Han So Hee have dismissed the dating rumors as unfounded, aiming to put an end to the speculation.

item.title: Here's how Kamal is 'handling' his new 'script' - Greatandhra
item.description:
Kamal Haasan Reveals His Unique Approach to New Script

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Great Andhra

Superstar Kamal Haasan humorously shared on Instagram that he is 'handling' his new script with 'kid gloves', showcasing his playful side.

  • Kamal is currently in the US and shared a photo from a clothing store, trying on tan gloves.
  • He recently spent time in Chicago, enjoying the chilly weather and sharing photos of his experiences.
  • Kamal will next appear in Mani Ratnam's film ‚ÄúThug Life‚Äù in November.
  • He expressed a desire to be referred to simply as 'Kamal Haasan' and declined affectionate titles to stay grounded in his craft.
‚ÄúThe art of cinema transcends beyond any one individual and I am but a student of the craft, forever hoping to evolve, learn and grow.‚Äù - Kamal Haasan

Kamal Haasan emphasizes humility and collaboration in cinema while requesting audiences to respect his wishes regarding how he is addressed.

item.title: Is 70-year old Govind Namdev dating 31-year old actress Shivangi Verma? The actor clarifies, 'Meri sudha - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Is 70-year old Govind Namdev dating 31-year old actress Shivangi Verma?

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

The news around Govind Namdev, a veteran actor, sparked dating rumors with the young actress Shivangi Verma following viral social media posts.

  • Govind Namdev clarified that the rumors of dating are false.
  • He explained that the photos circulated are related to his latest film, Gaurishankar Goharganj Wale.
  • Namdev expressed his commitment to his wife, Sudha, stressing that his affection towards her is unparalleled.
"Ye Real Life Love nahi hai, Reel Life hai janaab! Ek film hai ‚ÄòGaurishankar Goharganj Wale‚Äô... Falling in love with someone young in this lifetime is simply not possible."

This incident highlights how quickly rumors can spread, especially in the age of social media, and reinforces Namdev's dedication to his longtime spouse.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan leave daughter Aaradhya Bachchan's school event together amid divorce rumours. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan Seen Together Amid Divorce Rumours at Daughter's School Event

Date: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan attended their daughter Aaradhya's annual school event together, dispelling ongoing divorce rumours.

  • The couple was seen together at Dhirubhai Ambani School alongside Amitabh Bachchan.
  • They exhibited affectionate gestures, including holding hands and capturing moments from Aaradhya's performance.
  • Speculation about their separation arose in July 2024, after the couple was seen arriving separately at family events.
  • The school event was attended by other Bollywood stars including Shah Rukh Khan and Kareena Kapoor.
‚ÄúThe couple was accompanied by actor Amitabh Bachchan, who came to support his granddaughter Aaradhya.‚Äù

Despite speculation regarding their marriage, Aishwarya and Abhishek's appearance together signals ongoing family unity.

item.title: Travis Kelce puts an end to Taylor Swift engagement rumour after blurry picture surfaces: ‚ÄòHe thinks its‚Ä¶ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Travis Kelce Denies Engagement Rumors With Taylor Swift After Blurry Picture Sparks Speculation

Date: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce remain at the heart of engagement speculation, but they prefer to keep their relationship private, despite ongoing rumors.

  • The couple has been in the spotlight since summer, with fans speculating about their engagement.
  • A blurry photo from a surprise party sparked rumors of an engagement ring, but insiders claim there is no truth to it yet.
  • Kelce finds the rumors amusing but also overwhelming due to family pressures and public interest.
  • Both Swift and Kelce are focused on their careers and are not rushing into an engagement.
  • They plan to keep any future engagement low-key and private, despite media and fan speculation.
‚ÄúTravis has ideas, he would love to be engaged and married to Taylor, he is in love. She is in love with him.‚Äù

Ultimately, Travis and Taylor are enjoying their relationship without letting the engagement buzz disrupt their time together.

item.title: Viduthalai Part 2 Movie Review: Vijay Sethupathi, Soori's Powerful Sequel Is Gritty And Impactful - Times Now
item.description:
Viduthalai Part 2 Movie Review: Vijay Sethupathi, Soori's Powerful Sequel Is Gritty And Impactful

Publication Date: December 20
Source: Times Now

Introduction: Viduthalai Part 2 continues the storyline from its predecessor, diving deeper into the struggles of constable Kumaresan and the ideological clash with separatist leader Perumal. Despite gripping themes, pacing issues detract from the overall impact.

Key Points:
  • Soori and Vijay Sethupathi lead powerful performances.
  • Vetrimaaran's direction provides a raw portrayal of systemic oppression.
  • Some narrative coherence issues in comparison to the first film.
  • The film raises significant social issues through its characters.

‚ÄúViduthalai Part 2 is a bold attempt at closing an ambitious story, with Vetrimaaran‚Äôs signature storytelling and strong performances standing out.‚Äù

Conclusion: While Viduthalai Part 2 leaves a lasting impression with its intense themes and performances, it struggles with pacing and clarity, making it a nuanced but imperfect sequel.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna REACTS to Ranbir Kapoor‚Äôs casting as Ram in Ramayana; says, ‚ÄúWhoever plays Ram must embody Ram; he shouldn‚Äôt look like Raavan‚Äù - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Critiques Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Ram in Upcoming Ramayana Film

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Mukesh Khanna has expressed concerns about Ranbir Kapoor‚Äôs suitability to play Lord Ram in the upcoming adaptation of Ramayana, emphasizing the importance of embodying the character's virtues.

  • The film is directed by Nitesh Tiwari and will release in two parts, with the first set for Diwali 2026.
  • Khanna believes comparisons with Arun Govil, who famously played Ram, are inevitable.
  • He stresses that the actor portraying Ram should not just look the part but possess virtuous qualities.
  • Khanna raised concerns over Ranbir Kapoor's recent roles affecting his image, specifically citing his character in Animal.
  • He warned filmmakers about casting decisions, referencing the backlash against Prabhas in Adipurush.
‚ÄúWhoever plays Ram must embody Ram; he shouldn‚Äôt look like Raavan.‚Äù - Mukesh Khanna

Khanna's reflections underscore the cultural significance of the role and the expectations from the actor to resonate with the audience's perception of Lord Ram.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan holds Aishwarya Rai‚Äôs dupatta at Aaradhya‚Äôs school annual day event, Amitabh Bachchan cheers for granddaughter. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan holds Aishwarya Rai‚Äôs dupatta at Aaradhya‚Äôs school annual day event, Amitabh Bachchan cheers for granddaughter. Watch

Date: December 19, 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan attended their daughter Aaradhya‚Äôs school annual day function alongside Amitabh Bachchan, countering rumors of relationship troubles.

  • The event took place at the Dhirubhai Ambani School in Mumbai.
  • Aaradhya participated in a Christmas play, drawing attention with her performance.
  • Notable guests included Shah Rukh Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan.
  • The Bachchan family appeared united, dismissing personal life speculations.
‚ÄúTo be very honest, when a family is complete its beautiful üòç I wish every family always remain intact ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù

The Bachchan family's appearance radiated warmth and unity, leaving fans hopeful amidst speculations.

item.title: Ram Kapoor stuns fans with dramatic weight loss: ‚ÄúWas working on myself quite extensively‚Äù - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Ram Kapoor stuns fans with dramatic weight loss: ‚ÄúWas working on myself quite extensively‚Äù

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Bollywood Hungama

Television and film actor Ram Kapoor has surprised fans with his significant weight transformation, revealing a new fit physique after a hiatus from social media.

  • Ram Kapoor, 51, shared transformation pictures on Instagram.
  • Fans reacted positively, praising his dedication and transformation.
  • Mixed reactions were noted, with some missing his previous looks from popular shows.
  • Fellow actors and fans expressed admiration through comments and emojis.
‚ÄúHi guys, sorry for the slightly long absence from Insta was working on myself quite extensively.‚Äù - Ram Kapoor

This transformation has ignited conversations around physical health and dedication, showcasing Kapoor's commitment to fitness.

item.title: Vidhu Vinod Chopra CONFIRMS sequels to 3 Idiots and Munna Bhai are in development - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Vidhu Vinod Chopra Confirms Sequels to 3 Idiots and Munna Bhai

Publication Date: December 13, 2024    Source: Bollywood Hungama

Veteran filmmaker Vidhu Vinod Chopra has officially confirmed that sequels to his iconic films 3 Idiots and Munna Bhai are in development.

  • Chopra is currently working on scripts for 2 Idiots and Munna Bhai 3.
  • He emphasizes a commitment to quality over quick gains, stating he could have made money from sequels but prefers to deliver good films.
  • His latest project, Zero Se Start, offers a behind-the-scenes look at the making of his previous film, 12th Fail.
‚ÄúI could have made 2-3 sequels of Munna Bhai and 3 Idiots. Bahut maal kama leta main (I could have earned loads of money), but if those weren‚Äôt good films, I wouldn‚Äôt have enjoyed talking about them.‚Äù

The commitment to quality suggests that both sequels will focus on storytelling and character development.

item.title: Song Joong Ki Reveals His Wife‚Äôs Family Background For The First Time - Koreaboo
item.description:
Song Joong Ki Reveals His Wife‚Äôs Family Background For The First Time

Published on: December 20, 2024 Source: Koreaboo

Actor Song Joong Ki got unexpectedly candid about his wife‚Äôs family background during a recent interview.

  1. During a press preview for his movie Bogota: City of the Lost, he talked about his in-laws.
  2. Song revealed, ‚ÄúMy mother-in-law is Colombian. Many of my wife‚Äôs family lives there.‚Äù
  3. He reflected on the efforts to change the crime-heavy image of Colombia.
  4. Song expressed fond memories of his time in Colombia, saying, ‚ÄúThe Colombia I lived in was full of excitement, passion, and crazy food.‚Äù
  5. This was the first time he discussed his in-laws since marrying British actress Katy Louise Saunders in 2023.
  6. The movie Bogota: City of the Lost will be released on December 31.
‚ÄúI also saw people‚Äôs efforts to get away from that kind of an image.‚Äù

This interview provides a personal glimpse into Song Joong Ki's family connections and perspectives on Colombia, enriching the narrative around his upcoming film.

item.title: Marco X Review: Here's What Audiences Are Saying About Unni Mukundan's Action Thriller - Filmibeat
item.description:
Marco X Review: Audience Reactions to Unni Mukundan's Latest Action Thriller

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Filmibeat

Marco X, a much-anticipated Malayalam action thriller directed by Haneef Adeni, stars Unni Mukundan and was released for the Christmas weekend. The film is a spin-off of the 2019 movie Mikhael and aims to offer an intense cinematic experience.

  • The film features a powerful ensemble cast, including Jagadish, Siddique, Anson Paul, and Yukti Thareja.
  • Marco tells the story of Marco, the younger son of a notorious family involved in gold smuggling, who embarks on a journey of uncovering the truth after a shocking event.
  • The movie is also available in dubbed versions in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Hindi, increasing its audience reach.
  • Music is composed by Ravi Basrur, with cinematography by Chandru Selvaraj and editing by Shameer Muhammed.
  • The film was produced by Shareef Muhammed under Cubes Entertainments.
Stay tuned for insightful reviews on X (formerly Twitter), as audiences share their thoughts on this action-packed thriller.

Marco promises to deliver not only thrilling action but a compelling narrative enhanced by its star-studded cast and skilled production team.

item.title: Ram Kapoor stuns with drastic weight loss, flaunts cool new look; fans can't ‚Äòrecognise‚Äô him - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ram Kapoor's Dramatic Weight Loss Stuns Fans

Published on: Dec 20, 2024 08:14 AM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

In a remarkable transformation, Ram Kapoor left his fans amazed after sharing his new look on Instagram, reflecting significant weight loss and a stylish new wardrobe.

  • Ram Kapoor, seen recently after a long absence, showcased his stylish new look.
  • His outfit included a white graphic print shirt, black fitted jeans, and trendy sneakers.
  • The transformation has sparked a viral reaction on social media with many fans expressing disbelief.
  • Fellow celebrities and fans are commenting with surprise and admiration.
‚ÄúWow, the change is phenomenal.‚Äù - Comment from a fan.

This transformation journey has resonated widely, marking a significant moment for Ram Kapoor and his followers.

item.title: Pushpa 2: Allu Arjun's Film REMOVED From North Indian Theatres Despite Being A Box Office Hit? - News18
item.description:
Pushpa 2: Allu Arjun's Film Removed From North Indian Theatres Despite Being A Box Office Hit?

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun‚Äôs Pushpa 2: The Rule has become one of the highest-grossing films in Hindi cinema, but it has faced controversy as it was removed from PVR INOX theatres in North India.

  • The film has grossed Rs 600 crore within two weeks of its release.
  • It faced removal from North Indian theatres due to a reported dispute between the filmmakers and PVR INOX.
  • Trade analyst Manobala Vijayabalan reported the removal and later shared that the issue was resolved.
  • The film has crossed Rs 1,500 crore globally.
  • Allu Arjun was recently arrested in connection with a tragic incident during a screening of the film.
BREAKING: Pushpa 2‚É£ REMOVED‚úñÔ∏è from all PVR INOX chains in North India from Tomorrow.‚Äî Manobala Vijayabalan (@ManobalaV) December 19, 2024
BREAKING: Pushpa 2Ô∏è‚É£ PVR INOX agreement issue now resolved‚úÖ Shows opening slowly one by one‚è≥

This conflict highlights the challenges faced by successful films in the competitive landscape of cinema halls, especially amidst public incidents.

item.title: The Great Indian Kapil fiasco: After Atlee jibe, Kapil Sharma needs to rethink his jokes - The Indian Express
item.description:
The Great Indian Kapil Fiasco: After Atlee Jibe, Kapil Sharma Needs to Rethink His Jokes

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Indian Express

Kapil Sharma's recent remarks about director Atlee have ignited a heated discussion about the comedian's style of humor, leading many to question if he needs to reassess his approach.

  • The controversy revolves around Kapil's comments on Atlee's appearance during a promotional event for the film Jawan.
  • Netizens criticized Kapil for what they deemed inappropriate and racist comments aimed at Atlee.
  • In a response, Atlee emphasized that talent should not be judged by appearance.
  • This incident has reignited discussions about the offensive nature of humor on Kapil's show, which often relies on mocking individuals for their looks and characteristics.
  • Previous comments made by Kapil have also been scrutinized for perpetuating sexism and body shaming.
  • The article highlights the ongoing issue of regressive humor that continues to thrive in Hindi entertainment.
‚ÄúThere is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humour and hurt.‚Äù - Erma Bombeck

Kapil Sharma's recent controversy prompts reflection on the need for a shift in comedic approaches within mainstream Indian entertainment.

item.title: Photo Moment: Ram Charan looks dashing as he leaves for the US for Game Changer event - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan Leaves for the US for Game Changer Event

Published on Dec 20, 2024 8:03 am IST

Ram Charan was spotted looking stylish at the airport as he departs for the US to attend the mega pre-release event for his upcoming film, Game Changer.

  • Charan will participate in the event in Dallas, Texas, on December 21.
  • This marks the first-ever Telugu film pre-release event to take place on foreign soil.
  • The event will also feature director Shankar and actress Kiara Advani.
  • The theatrical trailer for Game Changer will be launched on December 27.
  • The film is set to release worldwide on January 10.
‚ÄúGame Changer will be entering the record books for being the first-ever Telugu film to have a pre-release event on foreign soil.‚Äù

This event is particularly significant as it adds a historic milestone for Telugu cinema and showcases the film's international appeal.

item.title: ‚ÄòMufasa: The Lion King‚Äô OTT release details: Where to watch the movie online - TOI Etimes
item.description:
‚ÄòMufasa: The Lion King‚Äô OTT Release Details: Where to Watch the Movie Online

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The highly anticipated animated film ‚ÄòMufasa: The Lion King‚Äô is set for a blockbuster release on December 20, aiming to tell the compelling story of Mufasa.

  • The film is directed by Barry Jenkins and has a production budget of 200 million.
  • It is expected to stream on Disney Plus Hotstar rather than Netflix due to its Disney production.
  • The film premiered in the US on December 9 and has received positive reviews for its stunning visuals and heartwarming storyline.
  • Voice cast includes Aaron Pierre as Mufasa, Kelvin Harrison Jr as Taka, and Seth Rogen as Pumbaa.
‚ÄúThe last time, the Hindi version performed incredibly well. This time, it‚Äôs a prequel, not a remake of the animated classic, so it‚Äôs something fresh.‚Äù - Shreyas Talpade

‚ÄòMufasa: The Lion King‚Äô is generating excitement as it brings a fresh narrative to the beloved franchise, making it a must-watch for fans.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai smile as they record their kids AbRam, Aaradhya Bachchan's performance at school event - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai attend kids' school event, record performances

Date & Source: Dec 20, 2024 07:33 AM IST - Hindustan Times

Introduction: Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai attended a school event where their kids, AbRam Khan and Aaradhya Bachchan, performed on stage. Both stars were seen recording their kids' performances.

  1. Aishwarya and Abhishek's daughter, Aaradhya Bachchan, performed on stage.
  2. Shah Rukh and Gauri's son, AbRam Khan, also performed with Aaradhya.
  3. Aishwarya and Abhishek were seen together at the event, putting rumors about their marriage to rest.
  4. Shah Rukh was accompanied by his wife Gauri and daughter Suhana.
  5. Other celebrities like Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput, Kareena Kapoor, and Saif Ali Khan also attended the event.
Shah Rukh was seen dancing with the school kids.

Conclusion: The event was a star-studded affair with many celebrities attending to support their kids. Shah Rukh and Aishwarya were both actively involved in recording their kids' performances.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule: Here's Why Allu Arjun Film REMOVED From PVR Inox In North India. EXPLAINED - Times Now
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule: Allu Arjun's Film Removed from PVR Inox in North India

Publication Date: December 20, 2023

Source: Bollywood Hungama

Pushpa 2: The Rule continues its impressive run at the box office, becoming the fastest Indian film to cross Rs 1050 crore worldwide. However, the film has now been removed from all PVR INOX chains in North India due to distribution conflicts.

  • Pushpa 2 is performing strongly but faces competition from the upcoming film Baby John.
  • Distributor Anil Thadani requested equal showings for both films during the holiday season.
  • If theatres do not comply, they might not receive the release order for Pushpa 2, impacting its showings.
  • This is reminiscent of previous disputes between Thadani's AA Films and PVR Inox.
‚ÄúIf theatres don‚Äôt agree, he has warned they won‚Äôt get the release order to show Pushpa 2 over the weekend, making the situation more difficult.‚Äù

The situation highlights the challenges faced by successful films during peak release periods, indicating the competitive nature of film distribution in India.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna‚Äôs collects 975 cr by 2nd Thursday - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna‚Äôs collects 975 cr by 2nd Thursday morning; to join elusive 1000 crore club soon

Published on: Not specified Source: Times of India

The film Pushpa 2 directed by Sukumar is close to joining the 1000 crore club, having collected Rs 975 crore as of Thursday morning.

  • The film collected Rs 973.2 crore by the end of 14 days, with an additional Rs 1.8 crore from morning shows.
  • It has become the highest-grossing Hindi film of all time, collecting Rs 607.35 crore from its Hindi version.
  • The Telugu version has grossed Rs 323.3 crore, and other versions contribute Rs 51.6 crore from Tamil and Rs 20.92 crore from Kannada and Malayalam combined.
  • The detailed day-wise box office collection shows a strong performance throughout its run.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 has beaten records set by Aamir Khan‚Äôs Dangal, establishing itself as a major hit.‚Äù

The film's legacy continues with plans for a third installment, Pushpa 3 - The Rampage, expected in 2-3 years.
